IP202604_syn_1:
Indication: Molecular markers.
Anesthesia: General, LMA.
EBUS: Station 4R viewed (8.4mm), not sampled. Station 11R sampled (7 passes).
ROSE: Adenocarcinoma.
Complications: None.
IP202604_syn_2:
PROCEDURE: EBUS-TBNA for staging and molecular profiling.
FINDINGS: The airway was inspected via LMA and found to be normal. EBUS examination revealed an enlarged station 4R node (8.4mm), which was not sampled. Station 11R was id[REDACTED] and sampled via transbronchial needle aspiration (22G needle, 7 passes) to ensure adequate cellularity for molecular testing. ROSE confirmed adenocarcinoma.
IP202604_syn_3:
Code: 31652 (EBUS-TBNA 1-2 stations).
Rationale: Only one station (11R) was sampled. Station 4R was imaged/measured but not aspirated, therefore it does not count toward the 31653 threshold.
Pathology: Adenocarcinoma confirmed on site.
IP202604_syn_4:
Resident Note
Procedure: EBUS
Indication: Cancer staging.
Steps:
1. LMA/General.
2. Scope in.
3. Saw 4R node, didn't stick it.
4. Went to 11R, did 7 passes for markers.
5. Path said Adeno.
6. Done.
IP202604_syn_5: ebus for markers propofol fentanyl lma. looked at 4r it was smallish 8mm didnt biopsy. went to 11r and biopsied that one 7 times to get enough tissue. rose said adenocarcinoma. no bleeding.
IP202604_syn_6: Under general anesthesia with an LMA, we performed an EBUS. We visualized station 4R but decided not to sample it. We proceeded to station 11R and performed 7 needle passes to obtain tissue for molecular markers. Rapid pathology confirmed adenocarcinoma. The patient tolerated the procedure well.
IP202604_syn_7:
[Indication]
Molecular markers.
[Anesthesia]
General, LMA.
[Description]
Station 4R imaged (8.4mm). Station 11R sampled (7 passes). ROSE: Adenocarcinoma.
[Plan]
Oncology f/u.
IP202604_syn_8: The patient presented for EBUS staging to obtain tissue for molecular markers. We used an LMA for the airway. We id[REDACTED] a lymph node at station 4R but elected to sample the node at station 11R instead. We performed seven passes to ensure sufficient tissue. The immediate pathology reading was consistent with adenocarcinoma.
IP202604_syn_9:
Procedure: EBUS-guided aspiration.
Target: Hilar node 11R.
Action: 4R was sonographically assessed but not entered. 11R was aspirated 7 times.
Result: Positive for adenocarcinoma.
